text: Approval for design changes to integrate the previously approved 42 fr. ventricular/atrial cannula and previously approved sewing cuff accessory.  The device, as modified, will be marketed under the trade name 42 fr. ventricular cannula with integrated sewing cuff and is indicated for use with the bvs 5000 biventricular support system and with the ab5000 circulatory support system.
